name: Play the Hand You're Dealt (buzzyard, indyzz, SleepyInsomniA)
name_original: Play the Hand You're Dealt (buzzyard, indyzz, SleepyInsomniA)
description:
Play the Hand You're Dealt

The old tales tell of a door inside the mountains. A door that only opens for the ones it has called.

Many have tried to resist the calling. All who have done so have gone mad.

Few have returned. And even fewer will tell what horrible things they've seen when they come back.

You can feel it. Calling. A familiar feeling, though never felt before. You must go to the caves. Go to find answers.

Play the Hand You're dealt is a deck builder, where your cards interact with the Wheel of Sigils. Play your cards and combine them with the right sigils to unleash powerful combos!

Features:

  • 30+ cards!
  • At least one (1) enemy!
  • 4 types of encounters!

plays best in 1920x1080
